title: Son jailed after father hit and killed by car
content: A man died from injuries sustained after being hit by a car driven by his son early Saturday morning, according to Tyler police.    It happened in a wooded area near 1100 E. Gentry Parkway around 2 a.m.          Police said 31-year-old Aaron Colston claims he was unaware 58-year-old Jody Colston was behind him when he backed his vehicle. Alcohol was detected by officers on the scene, according to Saturday’s press release.    Jody Colston was taken to UT Health Tyler Hospital, where he died.          Aaron Colston was arrested for criminally negligent homicide and booked into the Smith County Jail.    Investigators were called out to assist in the investigation and Justice of the Peace Quincy Beavers Jr. ordered an autopsy.
